ocr_mistral.text:
all Lands as by his Majesty's Commission and Royal Instructions to me are directed Lim Hod and appointed in the 99th. 100th. 101st. 102nd. and 103rd Articles of the same Instructions whereof I have given you a copy Givt. under my hand and seal at New York the second day of May in the Twelfth year of his Majesty's Prize Armory Dominick our thousand seven hundred and twenty six

By his Excellency's Command.

P. Robin, Deputy

Recd. Tuesday 24. May 1726. P. B.

By his Excellency's Command.

P. Robin, Deputy

Recd. Tuesday 24. May 1726. P. B.

all Lands as by his Majesty's Commission and Royal Instructions to me are directed Lim Hod and appointed in the 99th. 100th. 101st. 102nd. and 103rd Articles of the same Instructions whereof I have given you a copy Givt. under my hand and seal at New York the second day of May in the Twelfth year of his Majesty's Prize Armory Dominick our thousand seven hundred and twenty six

transcribe_handwriting.text:
al[so] Land as by [his] Majesty's Commission and
Royal Instructions to me are Directed Limitted
and Appointed in the 99th no. 101. 102. and 103
articles of the said Instructions whereof I have
given up on a Copy both under my hand and
Seal at New York the second day of May in
the Twelfth Year of his Majesty's Reign Annoq [Domini]
Domini one Thousand seven Hundred twenty six

By his Excellencys Command.

[Signature]

[Signature: A Robin, Dept]

Rect. Tues[day] 24. May 1726. R.B.

generate_title.title: Royal Instructions to Richard Smith in New York, 1726
